#summary Boards for testing BGA reflow soldering

These boards are still under development.

The relevant [http://www.lis.inpg.fr/realise_au_lis/kicad/ KiCAD] design files can be found through [http://code.google.com/p/micropendous/source/checkout SVN] in the `/Current_Designs/BGA_Regulator/` and `/Current_Designs/BGA_Audio_Amplifier/` directories.

PCBs of these designs can be purchased at cost through [http://www.batchpcb.com BatchPCB]:: [http://batchpcb.com/index.php/Products/44119 Audio Amplifier Board], [http://batchpcb.com/index.php/Products/44231 Regulators Board]
